examples.translation: 每个零件在装配前都经过仔细检查。
硫磺是炸药的一种组成成分。
如果我们缺少一种关键元件，我的工人又怎么能生产出这种设备呢？
examples.first: How can my people produce the unit if we are missing a vital

n: something determined in relation to something that includes it
an artifact that is one of the individual parts of which a composite entity is made up; especially a part that can be separated from or attached to a system
元件, 组件, 成份
